emochromatosisthe most common form of iron overload disease, which causes the body to absorb too much iron
                
For all types of porphyria, symptoms can be triggered by
                
- use of alcohol  - smoking  - use of certain medications or hormones  - exposure to sunlight  - stress  - dieting and fasting",NIDDK,Porphyria
What are the symptoms of Porphyria ?,"Some people with porphyria-causing gene mutations have latent porphyria, meaning they have no symptoms of the disorder.
